author: Simon Difford
description: Created by José Luis León from Mexico. José is the general manager in Grupo Sicario and is the owner of Baltra and Licoreria Limantour and he created this cocktail for Patrón Tequila as part of their activity at London Cocktail Week 2016.
name: Patrón Chipotle Punch

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass

video.description: Created by José Luis León from Mexico. José is the general manager in Grupo Sicario and is the owner of Baltra and Licoreria Limantour and he created this cocktail for Patrón Tequila as part of their activity at London Cocktail Week 2016.
video.name: HOWTO make Patrón Chipotle Punch
